question: Who is the winner of India's first Gold Medal at the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics?
explanation: On October 9, Weightlifter Jeremy Lalrinnunga from Mizoram has scripted history by clinching India\'s first-ever gold at the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics in Buenos Aires, Argentina. In Menâ€™s 62kg Group A weightlifting, Jeremy posted successful attempts of 120kg and 124kg in snatch and 142kg and 150kg in clean & jerk. With his best successful attempts of 124kg in snatch and 150kg in clean & jerk for a combined 274kg, he won the gold medal.
